mapper.insert: insert into cart (cart_no, member_email, menu_no, amount) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{member_email}, #{menu_no}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select cart_no, m.member_email, p.menu_no, menu_name, menu_price, amount, menu_price*amount from cart c, member m, menu p where c.member_email = m.member_email and c.menu_no = p.menu_no
